profile:
Green Side Up Contracting Inc. is a professional member of Landscape Ontario & we are an authorized TrexPro - Platinum status!

Over the last 22 years, we have established ourselves within the construction industry as an honest and reputable contractor.  We have earned this reputation by shaping the company around four core values: honesty, transparency, quality of workmanship, backed by above industry-standard warranties!

As the President of Green Side Up Contracting Inc. and a board member of the Toronto Chapter of Landscape Ontario, PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT and delivering EXCELLENCE are two of Jay's key priorities.

         ****************************10 YEAR STRUCTURAL WARRANTY - FENCING ****************************

Green Side Up Contracting Inc is a consistent award-winning, construction company that focuses on delivering high-quality workmanship and superior customer service.  We put our trust into our clients with extremely favorable payment terms - pay when the job is completed! We are active members of our community and believe in helping those who are less fortunate.

Services provided include but are not limited to:

-> Fence Construction (80' linear feet minumum)
 
-> Interlocking & Landscape Construction

-> Deck Construction (200 sq foot minumim) 

    - Trex
    - Cedar

***

Not only does Green Side Up Contracting Inc focus on PROTECTING YOUR INVESTMENT by offering a TEN-YEAR structural WARRANTY on fencing, we also believe that doing business together should be simple and transparent.

***

Please use our SELF SERVE CALCULATORS to obtain an INSTANT ESTIMATE for your DECK, FENCE or INTERLOCK project:

FENCE CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/fence-building-calculator/

DECK CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/deck-calculator/

INTERLOCKING CALCULATOR: https://greensideupcontracting.com/interlock-cost-calculator/

***

Please be sure to check our work by visiting:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/greensideupcontracting/

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRNuc7PofUOEHCwMf7NdUzQ/videos?view_as=subscriber

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GreenSideUpContracting/

We would also invite you to come on site during the construction process, so you can see our work in progress!

***

Building is fun, business is great, people are terrific and life is wonderful! 

I ask that you put your trust into Green Side Up Contracting - we not disappoint!!

On your side,

Jay Saveall

www.greensideupcontracting.com
service_area:
The maintenance side of our business covers Aurora, Newmarket, and North Richmond Hill. In the winter months we only service Aurora residential & Commercial & Commercial only in Newmarket

Our landscape construction side of our business covers the entire G.T.A.

profile:
Canada’s Gardenland is a leading domestic landscape construction and maintenance service provider in the Greater Toronto area. Our team of lawn specialists utilizes their knowledge of lawn science and their skills of artistic application to create the perfect look for your specific landscaping scenario. We understand that each property and client taste is different so we work diligently with you and your surroundings to tailor the best approach for meeting those needs. Canada’s Gardenland has both the tools and the experience available to help you bring your landscaping dream to life.
Canada’s Gardenland designs, creates, maintains and provides tools for domestic landscaping projects in the Greater Toronto area. Both artistic landscaping skills and applied lawn science is utilized in order to achieve the perfect atmosphere and our professional team works closely with clients to ensure that projects meet specific needs and requirements.

Proper landscaping requires the application of various aspects in order to make your property look its best. Therefore, Canada’s Gardenland first helps with the design and creation of the right landscaping techniques that complement the natural lay of land as well as any man-made structures on the premises. We also offer a variety of interlocking stone techniques that provide landscaping accents through beautifully designed and applied walkways, driveways and patios.

We can also apply creative outdoor lighting effects so that your landscape is transformed into a stunning sight of beauty after dark and provides safety to those visiting after hours. Quality landscaping maintenance is also offered through sod fertilization, trimming, grooming, replanting and cleaning so that your property always looks its best.

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT PAVING OF DRIVEWAYS. 

* NO DEPOSITS ARE REQUIRED for most INTERLOCKING STONE INSTALLATIONS.


PROUDLY SERVING : VAUGHAN, Concord, Thornhill, Maple, Woodbridge, Kleinburg, RICHMOND HILL, OAK RIDGES, MARKHAM, SCARBOROUGH, MISSISSAUGA, BRAMPTON, YORK REGION, KING CITY, AURORA, WHITCHURCH-STOUFFVILLE, BALLANTRAE, CEDAR VALLEY, NEWMARKET, NORTH YORK, EAST YORK, ETOBICOKE,TORONTO and the GTA, Ontario.
*
AT CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION, we specialize in NEW INSTALLATIONS of expertly PAVED RESIDENTIAL ASPHALT DRIVEWAYS, INTERLOCKING STONE, CONCRETE and NATURAL STONE.  
*
Our quality installations, attention to detail and warranties are unsurpassed.
*
We take pride in our workmanship, as well as in the planning and in the design of your project. We will enhance the beauty, comfort and curb-appeal of your home, while providing you with surface durability, added value and long lasting functionality. 

Furthermore, we can provide you with EXPERT REPAIRS to most interlocking stone, concrete and natural stone surfaces. 
*
By providing you with all of these service options, CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION eliminates your need to deal with multiple paving contractors. Your priorities are our top concerns.

We will help you to avoid extended construction project schedules and unnecessary expenses. We are always available to address any project-related questions, issues or concerns.  

We strive to provide you with professional guidance, workmanship, consultation and on-site supervision in order to make your new project experience with our paving company, a truly easy and pleasant one. 

*
All of our new ASPHALT installations come with a 1 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
All of our new INTERLOCKING STONE installations come with a 2 YEAR WRITTEN INSTALLATION WARRANTY.
*
CENTURY PAVING AND CONSTRUCTION provides a 3 YEAR WRITTEN WARRANTY on ALL new installations of NATURAL STONE and CONCRETE. 

We would be pleased to offer you A PERSONAL PROFESSIONAL CONSULTATION and A PRECISE ESTIMATE on your next planned outdoor project.

specialities:

You can be sure that all repairs and adjustments will be completed before the scheduled installation of asphalt or of any other adjacent surfaces. Scheduling, preparation and timing are some of the key elements for a successful and well coordinated,outdoor paving and landscaping project.
